entry.title: Heirs
entry.summary:
Author: otome_wandering

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 251,582Chapters: 18/75Kudos: 1,419

Summary: Marinette is the Star of the Order of the Miraculous, the still-in-training head, as well as the True Ladybug leading the Court of Miracles. After years at Hawkmoth's mercy, Marinette has decided that enough is enough and is reaching out to Batman, the detective of detectives to help her track down the villian's true identity. What better way to do this than a field trip to Gotham?Damian, the bloodson and heir to both the Cowl and the Demon's Head, wants nothing to do with the French Class who has won the Wayne Enterprises Summer Internship, yet his father insists he needs better interpersonal skills. He supposes it won't kill him to try to work with this supposedly skilled class president if it means that everyone will get off his back for being 'aggressively asocial' (although he will still keep NDAs on standby).A seal of fate, a blood right, and a hidden prophecy lead Marinette and Damian on a rollercoaster of emotions, humourous misunderstandings, comeuppance -- and marriage?!___Basically my attempt at a soulmate AU, full of just about every Damianette cliche and trope I can think of. And some original lore to make it work.Updating MonthlyMaribat Awards 2024 Winner

entry.title: letters to lovers (and the aftermath of cherry wine)
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 149,618Chapters: 38/?Kudos: 3,156

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng and Damian Wayne-Al Ghul are pen-pals for three years, during that time, Marinette slowly but surely falls in love (and Damian falls with her). Damian has to heal from his childhood and Marinette is still changing from growing pains; they are leaving partners and friends and toxicity and gods behind them.**Warning: reading this may cause whiplash-inducing criterion shift.You will no longer view anger as mad or friends the same way. Your concepts of "childhood" and "the right thing" will forever be changed. You will not be able to change it back.The average species lasts four million years on earth. We've been around for 300,000 of those years, but our ancestors were born six million years ago. To live you must adapt; change. Are you changing? What does that say about you?Reading this may cause delusions. You might start seeing ghosts. Or get a therapist.

entry.title: A Miraculous tale of Ladybug and Robin(Repost)
entry.summary:
Author: HeartStrikerMaze

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 134,807Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 1,079

Summary: Another Marinette's class goes to Gotham story.Marinette wins a contest to go the Gotham with her class, whom all hate her. She uses the opportunity to try and get in contact with Batman, but things don't go as planned.A few things will be similar to some other stories as I did take inspiration from them, but I made sure to add my own spin on stuff to make it my own.This is a repost, as I took it down with my account for personal reasons a few months back, but now I'm back!

entry.title: its you, the ghost I've been looking for
entry.summary:
Author: 123Beans

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,445Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 77

Summary: Last year Marinette's family moved to Gotham from Paris to start their business in the US.At school, Marinette hears stories about the tragic Wayne family. The family's home burned down and all of them died. Rumor says the family's ghosts haunt the grounds. Any who approach the destroyed manor will be chased out.Marinette wants to see the ghosts for herself, in doing so she meets a young boy (ghost?) named Damian. He feels a little too real to be a ghost, but how should she know what ghosts actually look like?---Childhood/imaginary friend AU

entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,887Chapters: 35/?Kudos: 399

Summary: In her final year of lycée, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itself—one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before it’s too late.

entry.title: We Should have Stayed in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: skhwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 105,100Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 8,707

Summary: The students of Gotham Academy were confused. It was International Friendship Week, and it was Gotham’s turn to host. Except no one wanted Gotham to host, not even Gotham! So the Directors of the Friendship Conference decided that it was in everybody’s best interest to skip the City of Crime and go straight to the City of Lights. Everyone thought that it was the perfect idea! Except for Paris. The Gothamites couldn’t help but laugh and scoff at the Parisians insistence that Gotham would be a much safer place than Paris, and nothing should change. And everyone, even one Damian Wayne, was thrilled when the petition went through, and they boarded the plane for Paris.And then…a giant baby…tried to eat the Eiffel Tower…they should have stayed in Gotham.

entry.title: Response from HR
entry.summary:
Author: SimplyAnotherWriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,023Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 1,677

Summary: Marinette only agreed to work at WE because Jagged and Penny insisted that it would be okay. They reassured her that they had scouted the company out just as thoroughly as she had taught them to, and so there shouldn't be any problems.And there wasn't! At least...Not until her Boss and his family decided to keep hovering over her 24/7, with one son acting like an overprotective brother, and another son constantly showing up and clinging to her(he had no right to have such a pretty face!!!).o0oOo0oPART 2! The extended version of Part 1~

entry.title: Gotham’s Red Thread
entry.summary:
Author: Weasely_twins_wife

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,079Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 67

Summary: She stood slowly, her eyes narrowing. “That’s a heavy accusation for someone who’s barely spoken to me.”“I investigate everyone who enters our space. You’re not an exception.”“Oh,” she said, stepping toward him, “so I’m just one more variable to control?”“That’s how I keep my family safe.”Marinette scoffed softly. “You don’t know me.”“I know you’re lying about something.”“And I know you’re using paranoia as a personality trait,” she snapped, then immediately reined herself in.

entry.title: Connections
entry.summary:
Author: Liquid_Luck

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,286Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 702

Summary: Knowing a person’s true soulmate is common in this world, but the way it manifests in different ways for everyone. For many this was simply the name of their other half, others were cryptic that ranged as a symbol for the other, a nickname, persona, and even half of a symbol where the other completes. These made up around 98% of the population, however the 2% were rare. This is where Marinette fell into, she and her soulmate share an invisible connection.

entry.title: The War of Balance
entry.summary:
Author: NightingaleRose2023

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,684Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 197

Summary: The League of Assassins has declared war against the Order of the Guardians, forcing the Miraculous Court, and their beloved leaders, Marinette and Damian, on a mission, a race against time, to recollect the remaining forgotten and missing miraculi around the globe.However, the aftermath of their previous war has created ripples...and with their current fight leading them far too close to a past life, worlds may collide. After all... The Al Ghul line will do anything to emerge victorious...(This is book two of my series, so for this story to make sense, please read book one before reading this one.)

entry.title: Breaking the News
entry.summary:
Author: Am_I_really_a_writerhuh

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,156Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 258

Summary: “Adam!” the girl screeched as she ran into their homeroom classroom.Adam, eyelids heavy, with a large thermos of steaming liquid caffeine blinked slowly at her.“Debra, it is too early for you to burst my eardrums with your screeching,”The blonde was undeterred.“Daminette. Just. Sailed.”His brown eyes were suddenly wide open, all grogginess dispelled.“Details. Now.” he demanded.orAll parties and some extra ones find out Daminette has finally sailed and celebrations incur

entry.title: Beneath Dense Fog
entry.summary:
Author: ExperienceNewWorlds1

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,358Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 127

Summary: Marinette was alone. So, utterly alone. Her class and family had turned on her. Her partner was harassing her. And she couldn’t even get upset because Hawkmoth would akumatize her.Benjamin wasn’t expecting to find a girl curled up in a ball in some alleyway. He definitely wasn’t expecting to see a floating red TALKING creature trying to comfort her. New to Paris, Ben doesn’t quite understand the significance, but there’s no way a girl like that should be crying alone in an alley.And Damian certainly wasn't expecting to feel a small twinge in his chest when Marinette smiled at any other boy.
